user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion in Orlando next month and I want to ensure that everyone has a great time. Can you please provide me with the 120-hour weather forecast for Orlando? Additionally, recommend some popular songs from the charts that I can play during the reunion. Lastly, suggest some fun activities or events happening in Orlando during that time.

TaskList.description: Get the 120-hour weather forecast for Orlando.
Fetch a list of popular songs from the charts.
Research fun activities or events happening in Orlando during the reunion time.
